Package com.example.hashcache.models.database.DatabaseAdapters

Class ScannableCodesDatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hashcache.models.database.DatabaseAdapters.ScannableCodesDatabaseAdapter
  • public class ScannableCodesDatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all calls to the Firebase ScannableCodes database

                                                         FireStoreHelper fireStoreHelper,
                                                         com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
        \ Makes and gets the static instance of the ScannableCodesConnectionHandler class with specific dependencies
        Parameters:
        scannableCodeDocumentConverter - the instance of the ScannableCodeDocumentConverter to use to convert documents to ScannableCode objects
        fireStoreHelper - the instance of the FireStoreHelper class to use to perform common FireStore actions
        db - the instance of the database to use to connect to the ScannableCodes collection
        Returns:
        ScannableCodesConnectionHandler.INSTANCE the newly created static instance of the ScannableCodesConnectionHandler class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the static instance of the ScannableCodesConnectionHandler class has already been initialized
